title: Find the location of a person on a board

content.description: A horizontal, uniform board of weight 125 N and length 4 m is supported by vertical chains at each end. A person weighing 500 N is sitting on the board. The tension in the right chain is 250 N.
content.question: How far from the left end of the board is the person sitting?

topic.text: 5.5: Rotational Equilibrium and Newton's First Law in Rotational Form

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
